text: mariyu anatha balikalaku n'yayam ceyalemane bhayam miku unte, miku naccina (itara) strilanu iddarini gani, muggurini gani, nalugurini gani vivaham cesukondi. Ayite varito n'yayanga vyavaharinca lemane bhayam miku unte, okamenu matrame; leda mi svadhinanlo nunnavarini (banisa strilanu dampatyanloki) tisukondi. Oke vaipunaku moggakunda (an'yayavartana nundi duranga undataniki) ide samucitamaina margam
